title: WildFly 29.0.1 is released!
content: WildFly 29.0.1.Final is now available .  It’s been about five weeks since the WildFly 29 release, so we’ve done a small bug fix update, WildFly 29.0.1. This includes an update to WildFly Preview.  The following issues were resolved in 29.0.1:  BUGS   * [] - Wildfly 29: does not start on JRE, works on JDK. Worked in WFLY28   * [] - [29.x] Upgrade com.squareup.okio to 3.4.0 (resolves CVE-2023-3635)   * [] - The testsuite/galleon tests are too unconstrained as to what channel is    tested   * [] - Problems with upgrade of resteasy-microprofile and CDI  ENHANCEMENTS   * [] - Move 29.x Quickstarts to BOMs and Server 29.0.1.Final  TASKS   * [] - Restore incorrectly updated copyright dates in Jipijapa  COMPONENT UPGRADES   * [] - [WildFly 29] Upgrade HAL to 3.6.12.Final   * [] - Upgrade RESTEasy to 6.2.5.Final   * [] - Upgrade resteasy-microprofile to 2.1.3.Final   * [] - Upgrade WildFly Core to 21.1.1.Final  Issues resolved in the WildFly Core update included with WildFly 29.0.1 were:  COMPONENT UPGRADES   * [] - Upgrade BouncyCastle to 1.76  Enjoy!
